# ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionKerberosMapping

**Class**

A set of Kerberos mappings that the system login process uses.

## Declaration

```swift
class ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionKerberosMapping
```

## Overview

This class contains a set of mappings for the sign-on token when importing the Kerberos ticket.

## Getting the properties

- **clientNameKeyName**: The key name of the Kerberos client name string.
- **encryptionKeyTypeKeyName**: The key name of the Kerberos session key type number.
- **messageBufferKeyName**: The key name of the Base 64-encoded Kerberos AS-REP string.
- **realmKeyName**: The key name of the Kerberos realm string.
- **serviceNameKeyName**: The key name of the Kerberos service name string.
- **sessionKeyKeyName**: The key name of the Kerberos session key.
- **ticketKeyPath**: The keypath in the response JSON that uses this set of mappings.

## Authentication

- **Authentication process**: Use a system-supported method to authenticate with an identity provider.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
